sentences.en: A few people came to Boo But remained to applaud.
sentences.cn: 很多人开始讥笑并不断地鼓掌.

sentences.en: A loud boo came from the back of the hall.
sentences.cn: 大厅后面传来很大的嘘声.

sentences.en: Before I had Scott, I would never say boo to a goose.
sentences.cn: 在遇到斯科特之前, 我从不吓唬别人.

sentences.en: Even when I'm with my boo, y'know I'm crazy over you.
sentences.cn: 即使和我的爱人在一起我只为你疯狂.

sentences.en: I did a boo - boo in my presentation - I hope no one notice it!
sentences.cn: 在我的报告里有唯一小小的错误, — 但愿没人主意到它.

sentences.en: I think I've made a boo-boo.
sentences.cn: 我觉得自己犯了个愚蠢的错误。

sentences.en: I told him about the Dewey Decimal for Shelving Boo ks.
sentences.cn: 我给他讲了讲杜威图书分类法,他很快就搞明白了.

sentences.en: Michael Myers - Child: [ to Baby Laurie ] Happy Halloween, Boo!
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·梅耶斯 ( 对还是婴儿的劳丽说 ): 万圣节快乐! 嘘!

sentences.en: She knew when to cheer and when to boo, and that was all one needed.
sentences.cn: 她只知道何时欢喜何时愁, 人该知道的还不就这些?

sentences.en: She was booed off stage (=  they shouted ‘boo’ until she left the stage  ) .
sentences.cn: 她被一片嘘声轰下了台。

sentences.en: Some of the audience started booing.
The boss may look a bit fierce, but in fact he wouldn't say " boo " to a goose.
sentences.cn: 老板可能看上去有点凶, 但实际上他不会吓唬人.

sentences.en: Then I wouldn't be standing here crying over you Boo - oo - oo - oo - oo - oo - who.
sentences.cn: 那么我就不会站在这里为你感到不幸了.

sentences.en: Tiger Woods would boo a goose with a wood.
sentences.cn: 老虎.伍滋会用嘘声加木杆吓走鹅.

sentences.en: What happened to Boo when Sulley was searching for her?
sentences.cn: 苏利在找阿布时,阿布发生了什么事情?

sentences.en: Why can not Sulley and Mike keep Boo too Happy?
sentences.cn: 苏利和麦克为什么不能让阿布太高兴 呢 ?

sentences.en: You can boo, but booing's got nothing to do with it!
sentences.cn: 你们可以随意嘘别人, 但是光动嘴巴根本做不了什么事!

trans.tran_en: a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
to shout ‘boo’ to show that you do not like a person, performance, idea etc
